definitions: Having or exhibiting a yellow discoloration of the skin, mucous membranes, and whites of the eyes due to an increase of bilirubin in the blood.
Exhibiting prejudice, envy, or resentment, often due to past experiences; cynical or pessimistic.
examples: The patient's jaundiced skin was a clear sign of liver issues.
He had a jaundiced view of politics after years of observing corruption.
Her jaundiced outlook made it difficult for her to trust anyone.
